messages.message:
Wanted to share a quick plug for Advent of Code (https://adventofcode.com/), an advent calendar of daily programming puzzles from Dec 1 to Dec 25! It’s a great way to keep up your programming/algos skills or pick up a new language. @Sławek Biel also created a private leaderboard so you can compete against your fellow Instabasers :ib:

To join: https://adventofcode.com/2022/leaderboard/private, use code `741905-cfb8fafa`
Can attest to how great aoc is, used it last year to pick up a working knowledge of Rust :slightly_smiling_face:
